name: generate_mind_map
description: Submit a hierarchical mind map structure representing the key concepts and their relationships from the content.

nodes.description: Array of mind map nodes forming a tree structure. First node must be the root (parent_id: null).

label.description: Short display label for the node (max 5 words)

parent_id.description: ID of parent node. Must be null for root node only. All other nodes must reference an existing node.

description.description: Brief explanation of this concept (1-2 sentences, max 50 words)

topic_summary.description: A brief 1-2 sentence summary of what this mind map covers
